What is the PGC?

The Portland Geek Council strives to unite and cultivate the Portland geek community. We provide opportunities, resources, and events to help network and buildÂ Portland’s geek community.

Learn More »

Want to Join?

Being an official member of the Portland Geek Council means you’ll have access to opportunities for networking, community building, skill-building, and targeted marketing.

Join Now »

Our Members

The PGC is home to geek enterprises throughout the Portland metro area, including businesses, non-profits, and event and media ventures. Learn more about our member organizations!
